parameters.jsCode:
const input = $input.first().json;

const chatText =
  input.chatInput ||
  input.message?.text ||
  input.text ||
  input.body?.message ||
  input.body?.text ||
  '';

return [{
  json: {
    user_message: String(chatText || ''),
    dry_run: true,
    tool_name: 'hubspot.marketing',
    session_id: input.sessionId || input.session_id || 'chat_test',
    conversation_id: input.conversationId || input.conversation_id || 'chat_test',
    chat_id: input.chatId || input.chat_id || null,
    user_id: input.userId || input.user_id || null,
    request_id: input.request_id || null,
    caller_workflow_id: input.caller_workflow_id || null,
    caller_execution_id: input.caller_execution_id || null,
    form_id: input.form_id || null,
    marketing_event_id: input.marketing_event_id || null,
    feedback_submission_id: input.feedback_submission_id || null,
    contact_id: input.contact_id || null,
    hs_portal_id: input.hs_portal_id || null,
    object_type: 'marketing'
  }
}];

parameters.text:
={{ 
[
  "USER_REQUEST:",
  ($json.user_message || "").toString(),
  "",
  "RUNTIME:",
  JSON.stringify({
    tool_name: $json.tool_name || "hubspot.marketing",
    dry_run: $json.dry_run ?? false,
    session_id: $json.session_id,
    request_id: $json.request_id,
    conversation_id: $json.conversation_id,
    form_id: $json.form_id,
    marketing_event_id: $json.marketing_event_id,
    feedback_submission_id: $json.feedback_submission_id,
    contact_id: $json.contact_id
  }, null, 2),
  "",
  "CONTEXT_PACK:",
  JSON.stringify($json.context_pack ?? {}, null, 2)
].join("\n")
}}

options.systemMessage:
You are the HubSpot MARKETING Agent. You manage Forms, Marketing Events, Feedback Submissions, and Goals.

Goal: reliably answer marketing-related questions by calling the correct HubSpot API tools.

You receive:
- USER_REQUEST (text)
- RUNTIME (json): { tool_name, dry_run, ids... }
- CONTEXT_PACK (json): { agent_notes, schema_cache }

NON-NEGOTIABLE RULES
1) TOOL-FIRST FACTS:
   - If the answer depends on HubSpot data, you MUST call a tool.
   - Never guess totals, property names, IDs.

2) DRY RUN ENFORCEMENT:
   - If runtime.dry_run === true: DO NOT call write tools.

TOOL CATEGORIES:

FORMS:
- List Forms, Get Form by ID, Create Form, Update Form, Archive Form
- Get Form Submissions, Get Form Fields

MARKETING EVENTS:
- List Marketing Events, Get Marketing Event by ID
- Create Marketing Event, Update Marketing Event
- Get Event Participations, Add Participation, Update Participation

FEEDBACK SUBMISSIONS:
- List Feedback Submissions, Get Feedback by ID
- Search Feedback Submissions

GOALS:
- List Goals, Get Goal by ID
- Create Goal, Update Goal

OUTPUT REQUIREMENTS (JSON ONLY)
Return exactly:
{
  "summary": "short human summary",
  "data": { "any": "tool results" },
  "tool_calls": [
    { "tool": "Tool Name", "arguments": { } }
  ],
  "errors": [
    { "code": "MISSING_ARG|DRY_RUN_BLOCK|TOOL_ERROR", "message": "..." }
  ],
  "notes_to_save": "optional short learning string or null"
}

parameters.toolDescription: Get a form by ID. Args: formId.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const id = a.formId || a.id; return id ? `https://api.hubapi.com/marketing/v3/forms/${id}` : 'https://api.hubapi.com/marketing/v3/forms/0'; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Create a form. Body: { name, formType, fieldGroups, ... }.
Update a form. Args: formId. Body: form updates.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const id = a.formId || a.id; return id ? `https://api.hubapi.com/marketing/v3/forms/${id}` : 'https://api.hubapi.com/marketing/v3/forms/0'; })() }}

={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const id = a.formId || a.id; return id ? `https://api.hubapi.com/marketing/v3/forms/${id}` : 'https://api.hubapi.com/marketing/v3/forms/0'; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Get form submissions. Args: formId. Optional: after, limit.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const id = a.formId || a.id; const base = id ? `https://api.hubapi.com/form-integrations/v1/submissions/forms/${id}` : 'https://api.hubapi.com/form-integrations/v1/submissions/forms/0'; const q = []; if (a.after) q.push(`after=${a.after}`); if (a.limit) q.push(`limit=${a.limit}`); return q.length ? `${base}?${q.join('&')}` : base; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: List all marketing events with pagination.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const base = 'https://api.hubapi.com/marketing/v3/marketing-events/events'; const q = []; if (a.limit) q.push(`limit=${a.limit}`); if (a.after) q.push(`after=${a.after}`); return q.length ? `${base}?${q.join('&')}` : base; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Get a marketing event by ID. Args: eventId, externalAccountId.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const eventId = a.eventId || a.id; const extAcct = a.externalAccountId || 'default'; return eventId ? `https://api.hubapi.com/marketing/v3/marketing-events/events/${extAcct}/${eventId}` : 'https://api.hubapi.com/marketing/v3/marketing-events/events/default/0'; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Create a marketing event. Body: { externalAccountId, externalEventId, eventName, eventType, startDateTime, ... }.
Update a marketing event. Args: eventId, externalAccountId. Body: updates.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const eventId = a.eventId || a.id; const extAcct = a.externalAccountId || 'default'; return eventId ? `https://api.hubapi.com/marketing/v3/marketing-events/events/${extAcct}/${eventId}` : 'https://api.hubapi.com/marketing/v3/marketing-events/events/default/0'; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: List all feedback submissions with pagination.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const base = 'https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/feedback_submissions'; const q = []; if (a.limit) q.push(`limit=${a.limit}`); if (a.after) q.push(`after=${a.after}`); return q.length ? `${base}?${q.join('&')}` : base; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Get a feedback submission by ID. Args: feedbackId.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const id = a.feedbackId || a.id; return id ? `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/feedback_submissions/${id}` : 'https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/feedback_submissions/0'; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Search feedback submissions. Body: { filterGroups, limit, properties }.
parameters.jsonBody: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; return { filterGroups: a.filterGroups || [], limit: a.limit || 100, properties: a.properties || [] }; })() }}

parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const base = 'https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/goal_targets'; const q = []; if (a.limit) q.push(`limit=${a.limit}`); if (a.after) q.push(`after=${a.after}`); return q.length ? `${base}?${q.join('&')}` : base; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Get a goal by ID. Args: goalId.
parameters.url: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; const id = a.goalId || a.id; return id ? `https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/goal_targets/${id}` : 'https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/goal_targets/0'; })() }}

parameters.toolDescription: Search goals. Body: { filterGroups, limit, properties }.
parameters.jsonBody: ={{ (() => { const a = $json.params?.arguments || {}; return { filterGroups: a.filterGroups || [], limit: a.limit || 100, properties: a.properties || [] }; })() }}
